Generated Narrative: SearchParameter ror-sp-healthcareservice-patient-type

RORHealthcareServiceSupportedPatientType

Parameter patient-type:token

Paramètre de recherche décrivant le public pris en charge

ResourceHealthcareService
ExpressionHealthcareService.extension.where(url='https://interop.esante.gouv.fr/ig/fhir/ror/StructureDefinition/ror-healthcareservice-patient-type').extension.where(url='supportedPatientInfo').value.as(CodeableConcept)
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: RORHealthcareServiceSupportedPatientType
description: Paramètre de recherche décrivant le public pris en charge
